edition: Lanx Satura Nicolao Terzaghi oblata, Genova 1963, p. 310-314 (C. Pasqual) = P.Genova 01, 9 (M. Amelotti - L. Migliardi Zingale, 1974)
plates: ed. princ. pl. III; P. Genova 01, pl. VI
greektext:
base edition: ed. pr.

Greek text in Unicode


1 Axileus
2 *Sofia. 
3 *Tabhs
4
author: anon.
contents: list of four personal names; perhaps an exercise of declension in the genitive.
frontback: also accross the fibres: ends of three lines, probably from an account, by a different hand; edited in ed. princ. of paraliterary text.
statepreservation: papyrus fragment (9.2 x 6.2 cm) containing 4 lines of writing in a single column (4.7 cm maximum width); all margins have been preserved: upper margin is 1.5 cm deep; lower margin is 1 cm; left-hand margin ,1.2 cm; the right-hand margin ranges from 3.1 to 5 cm.
lectionalsigns: low stop; trema on ?; simplification of double l?; corrections by writing over wrong strokes and by superscription.
hand: student's hand: "evolving", slightly leaning to the right, some letters formed fluently, others clumsily.
